name: Check An Invoice
description:
Check an Invoice is a SaaS application focused on identifying and preventing invoice fraud. Using AI and Machine Learning, invoice checks are automated to be completed within minutes. 

Suited to both large and small companies alike, the platform offers complete automation in the accounts payable process and is a cost effective solution to a rapidly growing problem. We currently cater to the UK and Australian market but are looking to expand to other geographies in the near future.

jobs.title: Marketing Manager
jobs.description:
Marketing Manager
London 
https://www.checkaninvoice.com

£30k – £35k 

Who we are:

Check an Invoice is a SaaS application focused on identifying and preventing invoice fraud. Using AI and Machine Learning, invoice checks are automated to be completed within minutes. 

Suited to both large and small companies alike, the platform offers complete automation in the accounts payable process and is a cost effective solution to a rapidly growing problem. We currently cater to the UK and Australian market but are looking to expand to other geographies in the near future. 
 
Who we are looking for:

We’re looking for a Marketing Manager to join the team and lead our marketing function. You will be responsible for all things related to product, digital and content marketing and have a chance to build your own strategy from scratch! As hard as we work we also love to have fun together so we are looking for someone who can add personality to our team and be a part of our growing community.  

You’ll be energetic and enjoy working in a fast paced environment that presents you with new challenges. You will bring a new skill set to the team but also be willing to learn and get involved with new ones.

What you will be doing:

-Develop  product positioning and messaging to communicate the vision and value of the product

- Produce sales materials and tools to facilitate the selling process 

- Create product information content,website copy and whitepapers  

- Lead Generation - Assist in developing and deploying digital marketing strategies 



- Work closely with Channel Partners to formulate and execute co-promoting strategies 

-Work closely with the Social Media Manager to formulate strategies for various social channels 

-Develop and lead content partnerships and PR to raise brand awareness 

-Work with our customers to build and publish case studies 

-Take full ownership of our blog and get as much engagement as possible

-Organise and plan our exhibitions and events


You will need:

-1-2 years previous B2B marketing experience

-A passion for technology and growing a startup

-Excellent communications skills in both written and spoken English, essential for this position

-Have a solid understanding of digital, content, communications. Previous experience with digital and product marketing is a bonus

-Be able to work both in a team and independently

-Be well organised with the ability to multitask and prioritise workload

-Be proactive and comfortable diving in where help is needed

-Be knowledgeable of and have some experience with social media

-Experience with Hubspot is a bonus

-Have an eagerness to gather and use data to optimise your work

-A sense of humour and a willingness to get involved with our socials




What we can offer you:

-Competitive salary and career progression opportunities

-Central London office

-Opportunity to be an early joiner in a rapidly growing company and build a department from the ground up

-Opportunity to progress your career and define our marketing strategy
